Package atrai.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Lexer
    Interface for lexers from which Trees can be built.
    Reducer
    Created by ksen on 2/18/17.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InternalNode
    Objects of type InternalNode forms the internal nodes of untyped trees, patterns, and templates.
    Pattern
    A specialized Tree for matching against other trees.
    ReplacementNode
    Created by ksen on 3/11/17.
    SimpleStringTokenizer
    A lexer for whitespace-delimited strings.
    Template
    A specialized Tree for rearranging parts of other trees.
    Transformer
    Manages sequencing patterns, modifiers, and replacers to build a complex chain of tree transformations.
    Tree
    Parent type for trees.
    TreeBuilder
    A utility class for incrementally building a tree
    UntypedTree
    A wrapper for rooted trees
    Visitor
    A visitor for trees with pre and post accept hooks.
